Text: Holiday Special Pay Nothing to Lose Weight This SeasonFor The Week of Monday November IMAGE Lose Pounds Or More In Days Or Less You can lose pounds or more in days or less with measurable results in just daysGuaranteed Scientists have developed a breakthrough weight loss program that tricks your body into burning existing fat It blocks new fat from settling in your body and it controls your hunger Plus it will increase your energy without the jitters or sleepless nights Introducing TrimLife the COMPLETE online weightloss program In just days youll see measurable results and in just days youll lose up to pounds or more In fact were so sure that youll lose weight that we can make this guarantee In fact were so sure that youll lose weight that well send you a FREE day sample to try if youll pay towards the shipping BONUS To ensure your success weve arranged for your own online personal licensed weightloss counselor to work with you every step of the way IMAGE Important subscription information Your privacy is extremely important to us You are receiving this offer because you are a registered subscriber to one of our sites or one of our affiliate sites and have requested to receive recurring mailings As a leader in permissionbased email marketing we are committed to delivering a highly rewarding experience with offers that include valuable discounts bargains special offers sweepstakes entertainment travel and financial opportunities However if you feel you have received this message in error or if you wish to unsubscribe please see the remove instructions at the end of this message Thank you for reading our special offers Please forward this deal alert along to your friends Have a great day Email Source Information This email has been sent to you as a subscriber of MediaTreccom To remove yourself from this mailing list point your browser to optoutcfm Enter your email address in the field provided and click Unsubscribe IMAGE
